message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. I think it's a great deal considering its value to you.  Let me know what you think!
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. I think it's a bit above my budget.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $8,000 is just too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $9,500?  I'm willing to be flexible to make this work.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $9,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $9,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
